devdoc.author: Alexander Schlindwein
devdoc.details: Allows to use different currencies to buy/sell IdeaTokens by integrating UniswapV2

buyTokens(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: Converts an input currency to Dai and buys IdeaTokens

params.ideaToken: The address of the IdeaToken to buy
params.inputAmount: The amount of inputCurrency to spend
params.inputCurrency: The address of the input currency. 0x0 means ETH

params.dai: The address of the Dai token
params.ideaTokenExchange: The address of the IdeaTokenExchange contract
params.uniswapV2Router02: The address of the UniswapV2Router02 contract
params.weth: The address of the WETH token

sellTokens(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Sells IdeaTokens and converts the received Dai to a specified currency

params.ideaToken: The address of the IdeaToken to sell
params.minOutput: The minimum output in outputCurrency for the sell
params.outputCurrency: The address of the desired output currency
params.recipient: The recipient of the output currency
params.tokenAmount: The amount of IdeaTokens to sell

devdoc.title: CurrencyConverter
